channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023120899
item.description:
Report X-2023120899

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-02T15:11:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-15
  • City: SAGINAW
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was being loaded on the truck when they noticed it was wet along the top and side. QA was notified and brought the package to the hazmat processing cage. DescribePack: 3 out of the 4 bottles inside had loose caps which caused the cleaner to leak out onto the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: It was placed inside a hazmat tote and brought to the hazmat processing cage.

item.title: Report X-2023121073
item.description:
Report X-2023121073

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-11
  • City: MADISON HEIGHTS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER REPSONED TO FLAMMABLE LIQUID 3 DAMAGE AT DOOR 95. PACKAGE LEAKED ON FLOOR UNDERNEATH THE DOCK. BOTH CONTAINERS WERE LEAKING. RESPONDER ABSORBED BOTH 1 GALLON CONTAINERS WITH ZEP ZORBENT. CLEANED THE FLOOR WITH 3M INDUSTRIAL WIPES. ALL ABSORBED CONTENTS AND DEBRIS WAS PLACED IN GREEN DMP BAG. AWAITING FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS FOR DISPOSAL.
